docs.text: Welcome Cadre De Vie SDK Android
docs.title: Home
Welcome Cadre De Vie SDK Android

docs.text:
Intégration dans le projet




Copier le fichier 
cdv-android-sdk.aar
 dans le dossier 
libs
 de votre projet


Dans le 
build.gradle
 racine de votre projet ajouter la configuration suivante à la section un dossier 
libs
 si il n'est pas déjà présent:





 allprojects {
     repositories {
         flatDir {
             dirs 'libs'
         }
     }
 }






Dans le 
build.gradle
 de votre application rajouter la ligne suivante dans la section 
dependencies
 :




dependencies {

    compile (name:'cdv-android-sdk', ext:'aar')
}




Ajout dans le Manifest


Dans la section 
application
 de votre 
Manifest.xml
 ajoutez les tags suivants:


   
meta-data android:name=
fr.cdv.baseUri
 android:value=
https://api.proto.cadredevie.fr
 /

        
meta-data android:name=
fr.cdv.apiKey
 android:value=
blHgqmtChWvo3RPg28ReqsJI
 /





Import du SDK


Pour utilser le SDK il est nécessaire d'importer le SDK depuis toutes les classes qui vont l'utiliser.


import fr.cdv.sdk.*;




Initialisation du SDK


Avant la première utilisation du SDK il est nécessaire de l'initialiser avec la méthode suivante:


CDVManager.sharedInstance().setup(getApplication());
docs.title: Installation
Intégration dans le projet

Dans la section  application  de votre  Manifest.xml  ajoutez les tags suivants:      meta-data android:name= fr.cdv.baseUri  android:value= https://api.proto.cadredevie.fr  / 
         meta-data android:name= fr.cdv.apiKey  android:value= blHgqmtChWvo3RPg28ReqsJI  /

docs.text:
L'API CadreDeVie permet de manipuler les entités suivantes:




CDVUser
 : Un utilisateur identifié de l'API


CDVContact
 : Des coordonnées de contact


CDVProperty
: un lieu


CDVAlert
: une alerte créée par un 
CDVUser
 pour être alerté sur une 
CDVProperty
 


CDVPOI
: des points d'intérêts (écoles, commerces...)
docs.title: Concepts
Login
Création d'un utilisateur
Modification d'un utilisateur
Login
Récupérer les détails sur l'utilisateur loggé

docs.text:
L'API permet de rechercher les properties correspondant à des critères géographiques, ou des critères de la property (surface, nombre de pièces...)


Critères de recherche


Pour effectuer une recheche il faut créer un objet de type CDVPropertySearch et lui définir les attributs à rechercher. 


Il est possible de limiter une recheche sur des critères géographiques en utilisant des polygones, une distance (en kilomètres) autour d'un point, ou une bounding box



 CDVPropertySearch _propertiesSearch = new CDVPropertySearch();

 _propertiesSearch.setPageSize(10);
         _propertiesSearch.setService(CDVPropertyService.buy);
         _propertiesSearch.setParentTypes(new ArrayList
String
(Arrays.asList(
house
, 
apartment
)));
         _propertiesSearch.setNbRooms(new ArrayList
Double
(Arrays.asList(new Double(2), new Double(3))));

 CDVGeoPoint firstPoint = new CDVGeoPoint();
    firstPoint.setLat(52.36947753602144);
    firstPoint.setLng(-7.237292528124954);
    CDVGeoPoint secondPoint = new CDVGeoPoint();
    secondPoint.setLat(40.036761141167766);
    secondPoint.setLng(11.637219190625046);

    CDVGeoBoundingBox boundingBox = new CDVGeoBoundingBox();
    boundingBox.getPoints().add(firstPoint);
    boundingBox.getPoints().add(secondPoint);
    _propertiesSearch.setGeoBoundingBox(boundingBox);






Recherche pour obtenir une liste


Une fois l'objet CDVPropertySearch créé il est possible de recherche les properties correspondantes


       new CDVManager.PropertiesSearchTask(_propertiesSearch, new CDVManager.PropertySearchResponseHandler() {

            @Override
            public void result(CDVException e, ArrayList
CDVProperty
 properties, int count) {
                if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() == null) {
                    System.out.println(
Search Properties Error : 
 + e.getErrorMessage());
                } else if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() != null) {
                    e.getNativeException().printStackTrace();
                } else {
                    System.out.println(properties.size() + 
 properties returned with search on a total of 
 + count + 
 properties
);


                }
            }
        }).execute();





Pour obtenir les résultats suivants (c-a-d la page suivante) il faut incrémenter la property 
cdvPage
 de l'objet 
CDVPropertySearch
 et relancer la recherche. La première page a l'index 
1
, la seconde page a l'index 
2
, etc-etc...



     propertiesSearch.cdvPage = 2





Recherche pour obtenir des cluster à fin d'affichage sur une carte


new CDVManager.MapPropertiesTask(_propertiesSearch, new CDVManager.MapPropertiesResponseHandler() {

                @Override
                public void result(CDVException e, ArrayList
CDVCluster
 clusters, int count) {
                    if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() == null) {
                        System.out.println(
Map Clusters Error : 
 + e.getErrorMessage());
                    } else if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() != null) {
                        e.getNativeException().printStackTrace();
                    } else {
                        System.out.println(clusters.size() + 
 clusters returned with search on a total of 
+ count +
 properties
);
                    }
                }
            }).execute();




Recherche du nombre de properties


Cette recherche permet d'obtenir uniquement le nombre de properties correspondant à une recherche, et non détails sur les properties


 new CDVManager.CountPropertiesTask(_propertiesSearch, new CDVManager.CountPropertiesResponseHandler() {

                @Override
                public void result(CDVException e, int count) {
                    if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() == null) {
                        System.out.println(
Map Clusters Error : 
 + e.getErrorMessage());
                    } else if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() != null) {
                        e.getNativeException().printStackTrace();
                    } else {
                        System.out.println(count + 
 properties
);
                    }
                }
            }).execute();




Recherche des propriétés par ID



ArrayList
Integer
 _propertiesIds = new ArrayList
Integer
();
 _propertiesIds.add(42);
 _propertiesIds.add(686);

 new CDVManager.PropertiesByIdsTask(_propertiesIds, new CDVManager.PropertiesResponseHandler() {

                            @Override
                            public void result(CDVException e, ArrayList
CDVProperty
 properties2) {
                                if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() == null) {
                                    System.out.println(
Search Properties Error : 
 + e.getErrorMessage());
                                } else if (e != null 
 e.getNativeException() != null) {
                                    e.getNativeException().printStackTrace();
                                } else {
                                    System.out.println(properties2.size() + 
 properties returned by ids
);
                                    for (CDVProperty _property: properties2) {
                                        System.out.println(_property.dictionary());
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }).execute();





Geo Precision (paramétrage)


The GeoHashgrid precision can either be defined in terms of the integer precision levels mentioned in the Elastic Search documentation.
Values outside of [1,12] will be rejected.
Alternatively, the precision level can be approximated from a distance measure like "1km", "10m"
(cf. https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-aggregations-bucket-geohashgrid-aggregation.html)


propertiesSearch.cdvGeoPrecision = 
2


/* 2 types of possible values (String):
 * - GeoHashgrid code: '1', '2', ..., '12'
 * - Distances: '1m', '10km'
 */





CDVProperty.cdvOtherDatas (données complementaires)


Chaque propriété comprend une propriété '.cdvOtherDatas' qui regroupe tout les informations de l'api non accessible directement via les autres propriété de l'objet CDVProperty.


Ci-desssous le model de donnée tel que retourné par l'api .PropertiesByIdsTask:



propertyDetail {
    id (integer): CDV’s DB reference ,
    flow_id (string): Flux provider DB reference ,
    reference (string, optional): Reference of the property ,
    title (string, optional): Original title (if exists) ,
    description (string, optional): Long text description ,
    city (string, optional): City location of the property ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the city ,
    location (location, optional): GPS coordinates of the property ,
    area (number, optional): Normalized area ,
    nb_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard rooms ,
    nb_bed_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard bedrooms ,
    cover (string, optional): URL of the cover photo ,
    images (Array[string], optional): URLs of the photos ,
    virtual_visit (string, optional): URL of the virtual visit ,
    price (number, optional): Net price ,
    price_per_meter (number, optional): Calculated ratio ,
    price_excl_fees (number, optional): Price excluding fees ,
    payer_fees (string, optional): Label of the payer(s) (in French) ,
    buyer_fees (boolean, optional): Must the buyer pay the fees? ,
    seller_fees (boolean, optional): Must the seller pay the fees? ,
    percentage_buyer_fees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the buyer ,
    percentage_seller_fees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the seller ,
    rent (number, optional): Rent price ,
    additionnal_rent (number, optional): Additionnal cost to the rent price ,
    monthly_rent_inc_charge (number, optional): Rent price including monthly charge(s) ,
    modality_rental_cost_recovery (string, optional): Description of how the initial rental cost is recovered ,
    inventory_fees (number, optional): Cost of the inventory ,
    tenancy_law (number, optional): Cost of the tenancy law ,
    url_public_tariff (string, optional): URL of the realtor public tariff (legal notice) ,
    dpe_label_consumption (string, optional): Energy consumption label (legal notice) ,
    dpe_value_consumption (number, optional): Energy consumption vale (legal notice) ,
    dpe_label_gaz (string, optional): Gas emission label (legal notice) ,
    dpe_value_gaz (number, optional): Gas emission vale (legal notice) ,
    type_parent (string, optional): Property type by category = ['parking', 'house', 'apartment', 'local', 'field', 'other'],
    type_label (string, optional): Property type in French (free label) ,
    type_style (string, optional): Property style by category = ['campaign', 'renovate', 'prestige'],
    lot (boolean, optional): Belongs to a program? ,
    agency (contact, optional): Agency/realtor contact ,
    developer (contact, optional): Developper head/sales-office contact ,
    integration_date (string, optional): Datetime 
YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
 ,
    ad_url (string, optional): Link to the original ad ,
    insee_code (string, optional): France INSEE code where the property is settled ,
    stay_area (integer, optional): Area of the living room (salon) ,
    year_of_construction (string, optional): Year of the construction, new or old ,
    exposure (string, optional): Free description ,
    kitchen (string, optional): Kitchen type (short description) ,
    nb_bathrooms (integer, optional): Number of standard BATHrooms ,
    nb_water_rooms (integer, optional): Water rooms aren't bath or WC ,
    attic (string, optional): Attic's short description ,
    terrace (integer, optional): None or several ,
    nearby_transport (string, optional): Free description ,
    nearby_school (string, optional): Free description ,
    nearby_commerce (string, optional): Free description ,
    heating_type (string, optional): Free description ,
    district (string, optional): Known district ,
    furnished (boolean, optional): Is it furnished? ,
    cellar (boolean, optional): Is there a Cellar? ,
    nb_floors (integer, optional): Number of inside floors ,
    elevator (boolean, optional): is there an elevator? ,
    nb_parkings (integer, optional): Private parkings ,
    parking_type (string, optional): Free description ,
    allotment (boolean, optional): Is the property in an allotment? ,
    field_area (integer, optional): Area of the parcel of land ,
    style (string, optional): Style of the construction ,
    year_of_renovation (string, optional): Year of renovation ,
    nb_levels (integer, optional): Number of levels of the building ,
    fireplace (boolean, optional): Is there a fireplace? ,
    nb_ground_floor_rooms (integer, optional): Number of ground floor rooms ,
    nb_wcs (integer, optional): Not bath- or water-rooms ,
    basement (boolean, optional): Settled at ground level (level 0)? ,
    veranda (boolean, optional): Veranda? ,
    garage (boolean, optional): Garage? (closed parking) ,
    nb_garage_slots (integer, optional): Number of private parkings inside the garage ,
    outbuildings (string, optional): Free description ,
    swimming_pool (boolean, optional): Swimming pool? ,
    floor (integer, optional): Floor number ,
    standing (string, optional): Free description ,
    intercom (boolean, optional): Is there an intercomm? ,
    green_spaces (boolean, optional): Is there green spaces? ,
    loggia (boolean, optional): Is there a loggia? ,
    balcony (boolean, optional): Is there a balcony? (at least one) ,
    private_garden (boolean, optional): Is there a private garden? ,
    heating (string, optional): Concatenation of heating_energy and heating_mechanism ,
    heating_energy (string, optional): Free description ,
    heating_mechanism (string, optional): Free description ,
    inner_state (string, optional): Free description ,
    connects (boolean, optional): Serviced (connected to water/electricity networks) ,
    far (integer, optional): French COS ,
    hnsa (integer, optional): French SHON ,
    facade (number, optional): Length of facade ,
    depth (number, optional): Depth in front of facade ,
    urbanism_certificate (boolean, optional): Urbanism certificate? ,
    lot_ref (string, optional): Reference of the lot ,
    max_height (number, optional): Max height of the building (permitted) ,
    building_permit (boolean, optional): Building permit? ,
    rental_yield (integer, optional): The rental yield ,
    nb_lots (integer, optional): Number of lots ,
    batch_lots_possible_sale (boolean, optional): Are batch lots proposed for sale? ,
    total_free_area (integer, optional): Total free area (unoccupied) ,
    total_area_occupied (integer, optional): Total occupied area ,
    free_living_area (integer, optional): Free living area/space ,
    occupied_living_area (integer, optional): Occupied living area/space ,
    free_commerce_area (integer, optional): Free commercial/office space ,
    occupied_commerce_area (integer, optional): Occupied commercial/office space ,
    view (string, optional): The view... ,
    geo_zone (string, optional): Free description of the environment ,
    condominium (boolean, optional): Is there a condominium? ,
    condominium_expenses (number, optional): Condominium expenses ,
    alur_nb_lots (integer, optional): Number of lots (French Alur law) ,
    alur_union_status (string, optional): The statutes of the Union managing the condominium ,
    alur_condominium_backup_plan (boolean, optional): Does a condominium backup plan exist? ,
    alur_percentage_fees_including (string, optional): The fees collected ,
    lead_certificate (boolean, optional): Does a lead certificate exist? ,
    diagnosis_asbestos (boolean, optional): Does a diagnosis asbestos exist? ,
    dpe_submitted (boolean, optional): Is the DPE submitted? (see dpe_xxx fields) ,
    dpe_virgin (boolean, optional): Is the DEP virgin? (see dpe_xxx flieds) ,
    mandate_type (string, optional): Type of mandate contracted between seller and realtor ,
    madate_ref (string, optional): Reference of the mandate ,
    agency_fees (number, optional): Agency or realtor fees ,
    charges (number, optional): Charges amount (usually per month) ,
    guarante_deposit (number, optional): Guarantee deposit amount (once) ,
    low_season_price (number, optional): Low season rent ,
    middle_season_price (number, optional): Middle season rent ,
    high_season_price (number, optional): High season rent ,
    low_season_comments (string, optional): Low season comments ,
    middle_season_comments (number, optional): Middle season comments ,
    high_season_comments (string, optional): High season comments ,
    environment (string, optional): Category of the environment (in French) ,
    life_annuity (number, optional): Life lease annuity ,
    head1lifetime_age (integer, optional): Life leasing, head 1 age ,
    head2lifetime_age (integer, optional): Life leasing, head 2 age ,
    free_for_sale (boolean, optional): Is it free for sale? ,
    availability_date (string, optional): Datetime of availability date ,
    digicode (string, optional): Digicode ,
    terrace_area (integer, optional): Main or all terrace area(s) ,
    balcony_area (integer, optional): Main or all balcony area(s) ,
    videocom (boolean, optional): A video intercomm ,
    garden_area (integer, optional): Area of the garden ,
    area_min (integer, optional): For a group of lots ,
    area_max (integer, optional): For a group of lots ,
    nb_properties (integer, optional): Number of properties ,
    price_min (number, optional): . ,
    delivery_year (string, optional): Year of delivery ,
    kitchen_type (string, optional): Free description ,
    rent_min (number, optional): For a group of lots ,
    rent_max (number, optional): For a group of lots ,
    lot_availability (string, optional): Datetime of availability ,
    living_area (integer, optional): Living area ,
    nb_available_properties (integer, optional): Number of available properties ,
    nb_rooms_min (integer, optional): Minimum number of rooms ,
    typical_lot (boolean, optional): Model/show unit ,
    main_features (string, optional): Free description ,
    update_at (string, optional): Datetime 
YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
 of the last update of the ad
}
location {
    lat (number): latitude ,
    lng (number): longitude ('lng' for Google Maps API... but use 'lon' for geoJSON, elastic or GIS...)
}
contact {
    flow_id (integer): Flux provider DB/file reference ,
    name (string, optional): Commercial or usual name ,
    reg_name (string, optional): Legal registered name (may be different) ,
    reg_number (string, optional): Legal registration number (country related) ,
    email (string, optional): Professionnal e-mail ,
    phone (string, optional): Professionnal phone ,
    street (string, optional): Address of the agency ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the agency ,
    city (string, optional): City of the agency ,
    country (string, optional): Country of the agency
}





Ci-desssous le model de donnée tel que retourné par l'api .PropertiesSearchTask:



property {
    id (integer): CDV’s DB reference ,
    flow_id (string): Flux provider DB reference ,
    reference (string, optional): Reference of the property ,
    title (string, optional): Original title (if exists) ,
    description (string, optional): Long text description ,
    city (string, optional): City location of the property ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the city ,
    location (location, optional): GPS coordinates of the property ,
    area (number, optional): Normalized area ,
    nb_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard rooms ,
    nb_bed_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard bedrooms ,
    cover (string, optional): URL of the cover photo ,
    images (Array[string], optional): URLs of the photos ,
    virtualVisit (string, optional): URL of the virtual visit ,
    price (number, optional): Net price ,
    price_per_meter (number, optional): Calculated ratio ,
    priceExclFees (number, optional): Price excluding fees ,
    payerFees (string, optional): Label of the payer(s) (in French) ,
    buyerFees (boolean, optional): Must the buyer pay the fees? ,
    sellerFees (boolean, optional): Must the seller pay the fees? ,
    percentageBuyerFees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the buyer ,
    percentageSellerFees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the seller ,
    rent (number, optional): Rent price ,
    additionnalRent (number, optional): Additionnal cost to the rent price ,
    monthlyRentIncCharge (number, optional): Rent price including monthly charge(s) ,
    modalityRentalCostRecovery (string, optional): Description of how the initial rental cost is recovered ,
    inventoryFees (number, optional): Cost of the inventory ,
    tenancyLaw (number, optional): Cost of the tenancy law ,
    urlPublicTariff (string, optional): URL of the realtor public tariff (legal notice) ,
    dpeLabelConsumption (string, optional): Energy consumption label (legal notice) ,
    dpeValueConsumption (number, optional): Energy consumption vale (legal notice) ,
    dpeLabelGaz (string, optional): Gas emission label (legal notice) ,
    dpeValueGaz (number, optional): Gas emission vale (legal notice) ,
    type_parent (string, optional): Property type by category = ['parking', 'house', 'apartment', 'local', 'field', 'other'],
    type_label (string, optional): Property type in French (free label) ,
    type_style (string, optional): Property style by category = ['campaign', 'renovate', 'prestige'],
    lot (boolean, optional): Belongs to a program? ,
    contact (contact, optional): Agency or realtor contact ,
    integration_date (string, optional): Datetime 
YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

}
location {
    lat (number): latitude ,
    lng (number): longitude ('lng' for Google Maps API... but use 'lon' for geoJSON, elastic or GIS...)
}
contact {
    flow_id (integer): Flux provider DB/file reference ,
    name (string, optional): Commercial or usual name ,
    reg_name (string, optional): Legal registered name (may be different) ,
    reg_number (string, optional): Legal registration number (country related) ,
    email (string, optional): Professionnal e-mail ,
    phone (string, optional): Professionnal phone ,
    street (string, optional): Address of the agency ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the agency ,
    city (string, optional): City of the agency ,
    country (string, optional): Country of the agency
}

docs.text:
The GeoHashgrid precision can either be defined in terms of the integer precision levels mentioned in the Elastic Search documentation.
Values outside of [1,12] will be rejected.
Alternatively, the precision level can be approximated from a distance measure like "1km", "10m"
(cf. https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-aggregations-bucket-geohashgrid-aggregation.html)  propertiesSearch.cdvGeoPrecision =  2 

/* 2 types of possible values (String):
 * - GeoHashgrid code: '1', '2', ..., '12'
 * - Distances: '1m', '10km'
 */

Chaque propriété comprend une propriété '.cdvOtherDatas' qui regroupe tout les informations de l'api non accessible directement via les autres propriété de l'objet CDVProperty.  Ci-desssous le model de donnée tel que retourné par l'api .PropertiesByIdsTask:  
propertyDetail {
    id (integer): CDV’s DB reference ,
    flow_id (string): Flux provider DB reference ,

    nb_levels (integer, optional): Number of levels of the building ,
    fireplace (boolean, optional): Is there a fireplace? ,
    nb_ground_floor_rooms (integer, optional): Number of ground floor rooms ,
    nb_wcs (integer, optional): Not bath- or water-rooms ,
    basement (boolean, optional): Settled at ground level (level 0)? ,
    veranda (boolean, optional): Veranda? ,
    garage (boolean, optional): Garage? (closed parking) ,
    nb_garage_slots (integer, optional): Number of private parkings inside the garage ,
    outbuildings (string, optional): Free description ,
    swimming_pool (boolean, optional): Swimming pool? ,
    floor (integer, optional): Floor number ,
    standing (string, optional): Free description ,
    intercom (boolean, optional): Is there an intercomm? ,
    green_spaces (boolean, optional): Is there green spaces? ,
    loggia (boolean, optional): Is there a loggia? ,
    balcony (boolean, optional): Is there a balcony? (at least one) ,
    private_garden (boolean, optional): Is there a private garden? ,
    heating (string, optional): Concatenation of heating_energy and heating_mechanism ,
    heating_energy (string, optional): Free description ,
    heating_mechanism (string, optional): Free description ,
    inner_state (string, optional): Free description ,
    connects (boolean, optional): Serviced (connected to water/electricity networks) ,
    far (integer, optional): French COS ,
    hnsa (integer, optional): French SHON ,
    facade (number, optional): Length of facade ,
    depth (number, optional): Depth in front of facade ,
    urbanism_certificate (boolean, optional): Urbanism certificate? ,
    lot_ref (string, optional): Reference of the lot ,
    max_height (number, optional): Max height of the building (permitted) ,
    building_permit (boolean, optional): Building permit? ,
    rental_yield (integer, optional): The rental yield ,
    nb_lots (integer, optional): Number of lots ,
    batch_lots_possible_sale (boolean, optional): Are batch lots proposed for sale? ,
    total_free_area (integer, optional): Total free area (unoccupied) ,
    total_area_occupied (integer, optional): Total occupied area ,
    free_living_area (integer, optional): Free living area/space ,
    occupied_living_area (integer, optional): Occupied living area/space ,
    free_commerce_area (integer, optional): Free commercial/office space ,
    occupied_commerce_area (integer, optional): Occupied commercial/office space ,
    view (string, optional): The view... ,
    geo_zone (string, optional): Free description of the environment ,
    condominium (boolean, optional): Is there a condominium? ,
    condominium_expenses (number, optional): Condominium expenses ,

    alur_union_status (string, optional): The statutes of the Union managing the condominium ,
    alur_condominium_backup_plan (boolean, optional): Does a condominium backup plan exist? ,
    alur_percentage_fees_including (string, optional): The fees collected ,
    lead_certificate (boolean, optional): Does a lead certificate exist? ,
    diagnosis_asbestos (boolean, optional): Does a diagnosis asbestos exist? ,
    dpe_submitted (boolean, optional): Is the DPE submitted? (see dpe_xxx fields) ,
    dpe_virgin (boolean, optional): Is the DEP virgin? (see dpe_xxx flieds) ,
    mandate_type (string, optional): Type of mandate contracted between seller and realtor ,
    madate_ref (string, optional): Reference of the mandate ,
    agency_fees (number, optional): Agency or realtor fees ,
    charges (number, optional): Charges amount (usually per month) ,
    guarante_deposit (number, optional): Guarantee deposit amount (once) ,
    low_season_price (number, optional): Low season rent ,
    middle_season_price (number, optional): Middle season rent ,
    high_season_price (number, optional): High season rent ,
    low_season_comments (string, optional): Low season comments ,
    middle_season_comments (number, optional): Middle season comments ,
    high_season_comments (string, optional): High season comments ,
    environment (string, optional): Category of the environment (in French) ,
    life_annuity (number, optional): Life lease annuity ,
    head1lifetime_age (integer, optional): Life leasing, head 1 age ,
    head2lifetime_age (integer, optional): Life leasing, head 2 age ,
    free_for_sale (boolean, optional): Is it free for sale? ,
    availability_date (string, optional): Datetime of availability date ,
    digicode (string, optional): Digicode ,
    terrace_area (integer, optional): Main or all terrace area(s) ,
    balcony_area (integer, optional): Main or all balcony area(s) ,
    videocom (boolean, optional): A video intercomm ,
    garden_area (integer, optional): Area of the garden ,
    area_min (integer, optional): For a group of lots ,
    area_max (integer, optional): For a group of lots ,
    nb_properties (integer, optional): Number of properties ,
    price_min (number, optional): . ,
    delivery_year (string, optional): Year of delivery ,
    kitchen_type (string, optional): Free description ,
    rent_min (number, optional): For a group of lots ,
    rent_max (number, optional): For a group of lots ,
    lot_availability (string, optional): Datetime of availability ,
    living_area (integer, optional): Living area ,
    nb_available_properties (integer, optional): Number of available properties ,
    nb_rooms_min (integer, optional): Minimum number of rooms ,
    typical_lot (boolean, optional): Model/show unit ,
    main_features (string, optional): Free description ,
    update_at (string, optional): Datetime  YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS  of the last update of the ad
}
location {
    lat (number): latitude ,
    lng (number): longitude ('lng' for Google Maps API... but use 'lon' for geoJSON, elastic or GIS...)
}
contact {
    flow_id (integer): Flux provider DB/file reference ,
    name (string, optional): Commercial or usual name ,
    reg_name (string, optional): Legal registered name (may be different) ,
    reg_number (string, optional): Legal registration number (country related) ,
    email (string, optional): Professionnal e-mail ,
    phone (string, optional): Professionnal phone ,
    street (string, optional): Address of the agency ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the agency ,
    city (string, optional): City of the agency ,
    country (string, optional): Country of the agency
}  Ci-desssous le model de donnée tel que retourné par l'api .PropertiesSearchTask:  
property {
    id (integer): CDV’s DB reference ,
    flow_id (string): Flux provider DB reference ,
    reference (string, optional): Reference of the property ,
    title (string, optional): Original title (if exists) ,
    description (string, optional): Long text description ,
    city (string, optional): City location of the property ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the city ,
    location (location, optional): GPS coordinates of the property ,
    area (number, optional): Normalized area ,
    nb_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard rooms ,
    nb_bed_rooms (integer, optional): Number of standard bedrooms ,
    cover (string, optional): URL of the cover photo ,
    images (Array[string], optional): URLs of the photos ,
    virtualVisit (string, optional): URL of the virtual visit ,
    price (number, optional): Net price ,
    price_per_meter (number, optional): Calculated ratio ,
    priceExclFees (number, optional): Price excluding fees ,
    payerFees (string, optional): Label of the payer(s) (in French) ,
    buyerFees (boolean, optional): Must the buyer pay the fees? ,
    sellerFees (boolean, optional): Must the seller pay the fees? ,
    percentageBuyerFees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the buyer ,
    percentageSellerFees (number, optional): Percentage fees payed by the seller ,
    rent (number, optional): Rent price ,
    additionnalRent (number, optional): Additionnal cost to the rent price ,
    monthlyRentIncCharge (number, optional): Rent price including monthly charge(s) ,
    modalityRentalCostRecovery (string, optional): Description of how the initial rental cost is recovered ,
    inventoryFees (number, optional): Cost of the inventory ,
    tenancyLaw (number, optional): Cost of the tenancy law ,
    urlPublicTariff (string, optional): URL of the realtor public tariff (legal notice) ,
    dpeLabelConsumption (string, optional): Energy consumption label (legal notice) ,
    dpeValueConsumption (number, optional): Energy consumption vale (legal notice) ,
    dpeLabelGaz (string, optional): Gas emission label (legal notice) ,
    dpeValueGaz (number, optional): Gas emission vale (legal notice) ,
    type_parent (string, optional): Property type by category = ['parking', 'house', 'apartment', 'local', 'field', 'other'],
    type_label (string, optional): Property type in French (free label) ,
    type_style (string, optional): Property style by category = ['campaign', 'renovate', 'prestige'],
    lot (boolean, optional): Belongs to a program? ,
    contact (contact, optional): Agency or realtor contact ,
    integration_date (string, optional): Datetime  YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS 
}
location {
    lat (number): latitude ,
    lng (number): longitude ('lng' for Google Maps API... but use 'lon' for geoJSON, elastic or GIS...)
}
contact {
    flow_id (integer): Flux provider DB/file reference ,
    name (string, optional): Commercial or usual name ,
    reg_name (string, optional): Legal registered name (may be different) ,
    reg_number (string, optional): Legal registration number (country related) ,
    email (string, optional): Professionnal e-mail ,
    phone (string, optional): Professionnal phone ,
    street (string, optional): Address of the agency ,
    zip (string, optional): Zipcode of the agency ,
    city (string, optional): City of the agency ,
    country (string, optional): Country of the agency
}
